des: "This guac is always a huge hit at parties and potlucks! I've gotten many requests for the recipe. It is so easy and delicious! You can use fresh cilantro instead of a big sploosh of cilantro paste, but the paste is easier and tastier."
ins: Stir avocado, cucumber, green onions, pomegranate seeds, lime juice, and cilantro paste together in a bowl. Season with salt.
